changelingQuest.title: The Affront to Nature
changelingQuest.description: INSECT PONIES?! EWW?! You have fought many strange mutated insect creatures in the wasteland. But not one that is so close to a normal pony. You should investigate. Somepony has to know something. It could be threat.
changelingQuest.desc-found-corpse: You found an insect pony-like corpse. Itâ€™s intelligent too. Maybe you will find out more by asking somepony or looking around.
changelingQuest.desc-found-others: You heard mentions of insect pony-like creatures. Maybe you will find out more by asking somepony or looking around.
changelingQuest.desc-unhaus-from-changeling: You just met one of these insect ponies. A talking one too. The direction to figure out more points to Unhaus.
changelingQuest.desc-unhaus-from-talking: {{unhausRevealerName}} pointed you to the direction of Unhaus, which functions as a waystation for caravan routes.
changelingQuest.desc-unhaus-others: There are insect ponies in the town Unhaus. You have to go in deeper.
changelingQuest.desc-found-secret-entrance: You found a way into the hill of the town. What is in there?
changelingQuest.desc-kidnapped: That damn Town and their damn mayor just got you kidnapped. You have to get out and learn more about these kidanppers.
changelingQuest.desc-queen-proposal: The queen desires to employ you as a collaborator to these changelings. Where will this lead you?
changelingQuest.findAboutUnhaus: Learn about the insect ponies location
